name: Brainma
description:
(for best performance press f11 to fullscreen after starting game)

In this turn based strategy game you play as Aliens having to break through a military facility! Defeat enemies and harvest their brains to use each units unique abilities.

Click on green units to select your unit, then choose move, attack, ability, or reload when your out of ammo. WASD to move camera, QE to rotate, mouse wheel to zoom. R to deselect unit. If an enemy is killed their square will no longer be lit up, move onto that square and use the brain ability to HARVEST their brain

Have fun!

Units and abilities:

Schpee - Looks like a basic alien. Ability: Buff your damage and accuracy for 3 turns

Morb - Lil slime guy. Ability: Split into 2 of yourself

Mindhack - Brain in a drone. Abilities: AOE damage and AOE heal

Konqeg - Big lobster. Ability: Roar to scare enemies into running away from you for a turn

Rin (tw: https://twitter.com/RinTheOne_) - Art, UI, Music, Additional Programming

Bee (tw: https://twitter.com/MelonBee00) - Map Design, Additional Programming, Additional UI, Additional SFX

Ben (tw: https://twitter.com/BeenedIdiot) - Design, Programming, Additional SFX

Jack (tw: https://twitter.com/jackobingham) - Design, Programming, Additional SFX, Additional Map Design
